class_notes: Online asynchronous with face-to-face intensives dates: June 26-29 class dates: June15, July 13 at 630p.
course_description: This course expands on the knowledge of the student neonatal nurse practitioner in assessment, differential diagnoses, management, comprehensive care and evaluation across the continuum (acute-critical-chronic care), for high risk and critically ill neonates/infants up to two years of age.
prerequisites: NRSG 556 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1697, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: M. Conway-Orgel, Status: Open
